basic zombie.name: basic zombie
basic zombie.description: Basic Zombie hates the term "Basic". He doesn't  consider himself some generic foe or common corpse. He's an individual, darn it, and he's going to make a difference even if it kills you.Regular Garden-variety zombie.Basic Zombie hates the term "Basic". He doesn't  consider himself some generic foe or common corpse. He's an individual, darn it, and he's going to make a difference even if it kills you.

conehead zombie.name: conehead zombie
conehead zombie.stamina: His traffic cone headpiece makes him twice as tough as normal zombies.
conehead zombie.description: After a wild night, Conehead Zombie woke up holding a mysterious receipt for a cone and industrial strength adhesive.His traffic cone headpiece makes him twice as tough as normal zombies.After a wild night, Conehead Zombie woke up holding a mysterious receipt for a cone and industrial strength adhesive.

buckethead zombie.name: buckethead zombie
buckethead zombie.stamina: His bucket hat makes him extremely resistant to damage.
buckethead zombie.description: There was a time when Buckethead Zombie was hailed as a zombie genius for his innovative bucket-on-head strategy. It's been a few years, though, and zombies wonder if he's got any surprises left. His secret? He doesn't.His bucket hat makes him extremely resistant to damage.There was a time when Buckethead Zombie was hailed as a zombie genius for his innovative bucket-on-head strategy. It's been a few years, though, and zombies wonder if he's got any surprises left. His secret? He doesn't.

flag zombie.name: flag zombie
flag zombie.stamina: His flag marks the arrival of a huge pile or "wave" of zombies.
flag zombie.description: A spelling impaired zombie named "Brian," Flag Zombie keeps thinking the rest of the zombies are talking to him. At least he feels important.His flag marks the arrival of a huge pile or "wave" of zombies.A spelling impaired zombie named "Brian," Flag Zombie keeps thinking the rest of the zombies are talking to him. At least he feels important.

pyramid-head zombie.name: pyramid-head zombie
pyramid-head zombie.stamina: Brickhead Zombie's brick head provides thorough brickheaded brickheadness.
pyramid-head zombie.description: After consultation with various storybook wolves, it was determined that straw helmets and wood helmets were not up to snuff, and that brick helmets had to be seriously considered.Brickhead Zombie's brick head provides thorough brickheaded brickheadness.After consultation with various storybook wolves, it was determined that straw helmets and wood helmets were not up to snuff, and that brick helmets had to be seriously considered.

imp mermaid zombie.stamina: Is hurled onto the lawn past your defenses, then shuffles ahead.
imp mermaid zombie.description: What he lacks in reach he more than makes up for with his bad attitude, or Zombattitude as he likes to call it. Don't encourage him.Is hurled onto the lawn past your defenses, then shuffles ahead.What he lacks in reach he more than makes up for with his bad attitude, or Zombattitude as he likes to call it. Don't encourage him.

brickhead zombie.name: brickhead zombie
brickhead zombie.stamina: Brickhead Zombie's brick head provides thorough brickheaded brickheadness.
brickhead zombie.description: After consultation with various storybook wolves, it was determined that straw helmets and wood helmets were not up to snuff, and that brick helmets had to be seriously considered.Brickhead Zombie's brick head provides thorough brickheaded brickheadness.After consultation with various storybook wolves, it was determined that straw helmets and wood helmets were not up to snuff, and that brick helmets had to be seriously considered.

rally zombie.name: rally zombie
rally zombie.stamina: Rally Zombie and his flag marks the arrival of a large clot or "pile" of zombies.
rally zombie.description: Rally Zombie splurged on the all-leather flag because, heck, he's worth it.Rally Zombie and his flag marks the arrival of a large clot or "pile" of zombies.Rally Zombie splurged on the all-leather flag because, heck, he's worth it.

roman zombie.name: roman zombie
roman zombie.description: Basic Zombie hates the term "Basic". He doesn't  consider himself some generic foe or common corpse. He's an individual, darn it, and he's going to make a difference even if it kills you.Regular Garden-variety zombie.Basic Zombie hates the term "Basic". He doesn't  consider himself some generic foe or common corpse. He's an individual, darn it, and he's going to make a difference even if it kills you.

roman conehead.name: roman conehead
roman conehead.stamina: His traffic cone headpiece makes him twice as tough as normal zombies.
roman conehead.description: After a wild night, Conehead Zombie woke up holding a mysterious receipt for a cone and industrial strength adhesive.His traffic cone headpiece makes him twice as tough as normal zombies.After a wild night, Conehead Zombie woke up holding a mysterious receipt for a cone and industrial strength adhesive.

roman buckethead.name: roman buckethead
roman buckethead.stamina: His bucket hat makes him extremely resistant to damage.
roman buckethead.description: There was a time when Buckethead Zombie was hailed as a zombie genius for his innovative bucket-on-head strategy. It's been a few years, though, and zombies wonder if he's got any surprises left. His secret? He doesn't.His bucket hat makes him extremely resistant to damage.There was a time when Buckethead Zombie was hailed as a zombie genius for his innovative bucket-on-head strategy. It's been a few years, though, and zombies wonder if he's got any surprises left. His secret? He doesn't.

roman flag zombie.name: roman flag zombie
roman flag zombie.stamina: His flag marks the arrival of a huge pile or "wave" of zombies.
roman flag zombie.description: A spelling impaired zombie named "Brian," Flag Zombie keeps thinking the rest of the zombies are talking to him. At least he feels important.His flag marks the arrival of a huge pile or "wave" of zombies.A spelling impaired zombie named "Brian," Flag Zombie keeps thinking the rest of the zombies are talking to him. carnie imp split.name: carnie imp split
carnie imp split.stamina: Is hurled onto the lawn past your defenses, then shuffles ahead.
carnie imp split.description: What he lacks in reach he more than makes up for with his bad attitude, or Zombattitude as he likes to call it. Don't encourage him.Is hurled onto the lawn past your defenses, then shuffles ahead.What he lacks in reach he more than makes up for with his bad attitude, or Zombattitude as he likes to call it. Don't encourage him.

strongman gargantuar.name: strongman gargantuar
strongman gargantuar.stamina: Gargantuar really is kind of a big deal.
strongman gargantuar.description: Gargantuar really is kind of a big deal.TOUGHNESSGreat

imp pear imp.name: imp pear imp
imp pear imp.stamina: Is hurled onto the lawn past your defenses, then shuffles ahead.
imp pear imp.description: What he lacks in reach he more than makes up for with his bad attitude, or Zombattitude as he likes to call it. Don't encourage him.Is hurled onto the lawn past your defenses, then shuffles ahead.What he lacks in reach he more than makes up for with his bad attitude, or Zombattitude as he likes to call it. Don't encourage him.

ra zombie.name: ra zombie
ra zombie.description: Ra Zombie isn't actually named after the Sun God Ra, though that's a common mistake. He just likes to say Ra a lot.. Tries to steal sun, just for safe keeping..

camel zombies.name: camel zombies
camel zombies.special: arrives in a group of three zombies or more
camel zombies.description: Arrives in step with other Camel Zombies..

explorer zombie.name: explorer zombie
explorer zombie.description: torch destroys a plant on contact. Carries a torch that can instantly destroy your plants..

tomb raiser zombie.name: tomb raiser zombie
tomb raiser zombie.description: Throws out bones to create tombstones..

pharaoh zombie.name: pharaoh zombie
pharaoh zombie.speed details: moves like a hungry zombie once free
pharaoh zombie.description: The second cousin once removed of King Rot, he rose to power with his disappearing sarcophagus act, but met his untimely end in an unfortunate goat accident. His tale is told in great detail on the back of his sarcophagus, which no one will ever see.. His sarcophagus greatly protects him but slows down a rather fast zombie..

torchlight zombie.name: torchlight zombie
torchlight zombie.description: Carries a torch that instantly destroys plants and scorches the earth.

zombot sphinx-inator.name: zombot sphinx-inator
zombot sphinx-inator.description: The destroyer of plants from the ancient sands..

swashbuckler zombie.name: swashbuckler zombie
swashbuckler zombie.special: lands four tiles into your lawn
swashbuckler zombie.description: Swings in on a rope to lane midway onto your lawn..

seagull zombie.name: seagull zombie
seagull zombie.description: spikeweed.  and . passes over low plants like . Crosses watery gaps without a plank and flies over low plants..

barrel roller zombie.name: barrel roller zombie
barrel roller zombie.damage: imps thrown from barrel when destroyed
barrel roller zombie.description: crushes plants with barrel. His rolling barrel crushes plants and provides excellent protection..

pirate captain zombie.name: pirate captain zombie
pirate captain zombie.description: His parrot can fly away with your plant and then return to him..

zombie parrot.name: zombie parrot
zombie parrot.special: can fly to plants in other lanes to take them away
zombie parrot.description: Quickly flies from the Captain to carry away a plant..

pelican zombie.name: pelican zombie
pelican zombie.description: Pelican Zombie crosses water without a plank and flies over low plants..

zombot plank walker.name: zombot plank walker
zombot plank walker.special: cannon can rain down imps past your defenses
zombot plank walker.description: The plant plundering privateer of the high seas..

prospector zombie.name: prospector zombie
prospector zombie.special: appears on the left side of your lawn when dynamite explodes
prospector zombie.description: There once was a zombie who got old, spending all his day looking for gold. 'Til one day in the rain, he finally ate the brains… and, wait, where's his other shoe?. Launches over your defenses when his fuse blows down..

pianist zombie.name: pianist zombie
pianist zombie.special: causes cowboy zombies to switch lanes
pianist zombie.description: Pianist Zombie only knows two songs, and they're both groaners.. His rolling piano crushes plants while his music causes dancing zombies to switch lanes..

poncho zombie.name: poncho zombie
poncho zombie.special: randomly wears a protective metal grate
poncho zombie.description: Sometimes has a hidden armored plate..

chicken wrangler zombie.name: chicken wrangler zombie
chicken wrangler zombie.description: After publishing the fourth study on Ornithology, and four years of research at the Hadron Collider, Chicken Wrangler Zombie has finally solved the riddle of what came first.. Releases a flock of chickens once his baling wire is broken..

zombie chicken.name: zombie chicken
zombie chicken.description: Once released onto the lawn chickens run at full speed to peck at your brains.

zombie bull.name: zombie bull
zombie bull.description: launches a low flying imp rider over plants. Can launch his zombie rider past most of your defenses..

rodeo legend zombie.name: rodeo legend zombie
rodeo legend zombie.description: Rodeo Legend Zombie smashes a plant and launches his zombie rider past most of your defenses.

zombot war wagon.name: zombot war wagon
zombot war wagon.special: fires four missiles instead of one
zombot war wagon.description: missile attacks can target mine carts. The stagecoach of destruction from the western wilds..

blockhead zombie.name: blockhead zombie
blockhead zombie.description: The ice block on his head provides amazing protection from damage.

hunter zombie.name: hunter zombie
hunter zombie.description: Zombie that can throw snow balls at range to cool down plants until they freeze into blocks.

dodo rider zombie.name: dodo rider zombie
dodo rider zombie.description: Dodo bird with an imp rider. The dodo can flap and jump over barricades as well as troublesome plants.

troglobite.name: troglobite
troglobite.description: Strong zombie that can push blocks of ice across the lawn..

weasel hoarder.name: weasel hoarder
weasel hoarder.special: Releases zombie ice weasels when damaged
weasel hoarder.description: Weasel Hoarder claims she's the one who wrote the song Pop! Goes the Weasel. And for eons now, she's been demanding royalties for it. But everyone just ignores her. They know what Weasel Hoarder can't even carry a tune, much less write a catchy ditty about the sound of vermin make when hugged a bit too tightly.. Zombie hiding in a log with a pack of snow weasels. Weasels are released when her log is shattered..

ice weasel.name: ice weasel
ice weasel.description: Once released, weasels run full speed even over ice floes to nibble your brains.

zombot tuskmaster 10,000 bc.name: zombot tuskmaster 10,000 bc
zombot tuskmaster 10,000 bc.description: dr. zomboss was real impressed with himself when he came up with the idea to build a weaponized woolly mammoth with the power to blast snow and ice out of its mechanical trunk. but what dr. zomboss didn't realize until it was too late he's allergic to mammoth fur. now he has to load up on allergy medication every time he wants to take the darn thing out for a spin. The mammoth mech with an ice blast from the past.

excavator zombie.name: excavator zombie
excavator zombie.damage: blocks incoming projectiles, but is vulnerable to lobbed shots
excavator zombie.description: Digs up plants and throws them behind him..

parasol zombie.name: parasol zombie
parasol zombie.description: Her parasol provides protection from lobbed projectiles.

bug zombie.name: bug zombie
bug zombie.description: Bug carries zombie in over ground defenses and lifts him over barriers.

imp porter.name: imp porter
imp porter.description: Drops pack on Gold Tile; pack becomes tent from which zombies emerge.

turquoise skull zombie.name: turquoise skull zombie
turquoise skull zombie.description: beam range is increased when more sun is stolen. tries to steal sun. destroys one plant on the 4 tiles in front of him after attempting to steal sun. Uses skull to steal sun, then unleashes energy in a destructive beam..

zombot aerostatic gondola.name: zombot aerostatic gondola
zombot aerostatic gondola.special: drops zombies and bags o' sand
zombot aerostatic gondola.description: The floating fortress from the skies above..

mecha-football zombie.name: mecha-football zombie
mecha-football zombie.special: pushes plants left instead of eating

disco-tron 3000.name: disco-tron 3000
disco-tron 3000.description: After some initial problems with the sideburn suspension system, the Disco-tron 3000 went on to become the shufflin' dance-bot of doom it is today.. Drops in disco zombies when dropping the beat..

robo-cone zombie.name: robo-cone zombie
robo-cone zombie.description: The armor-plated cone offers phenomenal protection for its pilot.

shield zombie.name: shield zombie
shield zombie.special: creates a shield to protect from incoming attacks
shield zombie.description: Shield Zombie developed his system using funds from a BiteStarter campaign. The push goal for pushing plants was not met.. Protect himself and nearby zombies with a force field..

blastronaut zombie.name: blastronaut zombie
blastronaut zombie.description: floats over low plants, boosts over most other plants. Blastronaut Zombie boosts to float over all but the tallest plants..

bug bot imp.name: bug bot imp
bug bot imp.description: Lands on the lawn past your defenses, then hops forward.

gargantuar prime.name: gargantuar prime
gargantuar prime.special: has it all heavy armor, laser eyes, smashing arms, and bug bot deployment system.randomly burns tiles with laser eyes

zombot tomorrow-tron.name: zombot tomorrow-tron
zombot tomorrow-tron.special: missile attacks can destroy Power Tiles
zombot tomorrow-tron.description: The Power Tile crushing creation from the Far Future..

knight zombie.name: knight zombie
knight zombie.description: His king appointed helm provides amazing protection from damage.

jester zombie.name: jester zombie
jester zombie.description: Returns projectiles that are shot at him.

imp dragon zombie.name: imp dragon zombie
imp dragon zombie.description: Spit past most your defenses, then claws forward..

zombot dark dragon.name: zombot dark dragon
zombot dark dragon.damage: lobbed fireballs can hatch Imp Dragon Zombies
zombot dark dragon.description: fire breathing attacks destroy plants. The desolator of all, from dark times..

punk zombie.name: punk zombie
punk zombie.description: pull off his head. Moshes plants back a space when his jam is playing..

mc zom-b.name: mc zom-b
mc zom-b.description: Spins microphone to damage nearby plants when he's dropping his sick, sick rhymes..

breakdancer zombie.name: breakdancer zombie
breakdancer zombie.description: Kicks zombies forward when transported by the power of rap.

glitter zombie.name: glitter zombie
glitter zombie.description: Trails glamorous rainbows that protect zombies behind her when she's feeling the beat.

boombox zombie.name: boombox zombie
boombox zombie.special: Boom box has no effect on ground plants and Phat Beets
boombox zombie.description: Holds aloft a boom box that tranquilizes all plants with its heartfelt tunes..

arcade zombie.name: arcade zombie
arcade zombie.description: Pushes an arcade cabinet that spits out 8-Bit Zombies..

8-bit zombie.name: 8-bit zombie
8-bit zombie.description: Pixelated zombie generated by super cool arcade machine. Comes in regular, cone, and bucket flavors.

zombot multi-stage masher.name: zombot multi-stage masher
zombot multi-stage masher.special: Speakers do passive damage (except to ground plants and Phat Beet) and send out shockwave attacks
zombot multi-stage masher.description: An intimate evening with some of Dr. Zomboss' most recent and painful explorations..

jurassic fossilhead.name: jurassic fossilhead
jurassic fossilhead.description: Fossil skulls not only provide a huge amount of damage absorption, but are also extremely classy.

jurassic bully.name: jurassic bully
jurassic bully.description: Jurassic Bully is slow, stupid, and smells bad. But hey, at least he's punctual.. A trudging, damage-resistant zombie who is immune to Primal Peashooter's knockback..

jurassic rockpuncher.name: jurassic rockpuncher
jurassic rockpuncher.description: crushes plants with rocks tied to his hands. Jurassic Rockpuncher pummels plants with rocks tied to his hands..

jurassic imp.name: jurassic imp
jurassic imp.description: A weaker, smaller, much more vicious version of the typical Jurassic zombie.

jurassic gargantuar.name: jurassic gargantuar
jurassic gargantuar.description: Jurassic Gargantuar wonders how there can be zombies millions of years before the advent of humanity. He doesn't let it get in the way of his plant-bashing, though.. Prehistoric provider of Mesozoic malarkey..

zombot dinotronic mechasaur.name: zombot dinotronic mechasaur
zombot dinotronic mechasaur.description: A mechanical means of dinosaurian destruction..

surfer zombie.name: surfer zombie
surfer zombie.damage: can crush a plant with his board
surfer zombie.description: Surfs past plants on the water, then carries board on land..

octo zombie.name: octo zombie
octo zombie.special: bound plants are passive until their octopus is destroyed
octo zombie.description: Throws octopi at your plants to bind them up..

zombot sharktronic sub.name: zombot sharktronic sub
zombot sharktronic sub.special: summoned zombie sharks can consume plants
zombot sharktronic sub.description: mouth turbine can pull plants to it. The ravenous engine of carnage from the murky depths..

all-star zombie.name: all-star zombie
all-star zombie.damage: slows down and becomes a stiff zombie after tackling a plant
all-star zombie.description: charges like a flighty zombie upon entering the lawn and destroys the first plant he meets. A heavy-duty zombie who charges your defensive line..

super-fan imp.name: super-fan imp
super-fan imp.description: An all-too-enthusiastic imp who explodes with rah-rah-rah.

sunday edition zombie.name: sunday edition zombie
sunday edition zombie.special: become a flighty zombie when enraged
sunday edition zombie.description: The newspaper protects zombie, who becomes enraged when it is destroyed..

centurion zombie.name: centurion zombie
centurion zombie.description: A higher grade of Roman Zombie.

healer zombie.name: healer zombie
healer zombie.description: hot tip take this one out as fast as you can if you don't want your life turned into a pit of abject misery and despair. Uses weird Roman magic to heal zombies..

roman shield zombie.name: roman shield zombie
roman shield zombie.description: A dull-witted, unusually shy Roman zombie who's also carrying a shield.

zcorpion zombie.name: zcorpion zombie
zcorpion zombie.description: A ballista from Ancient Rome, the Zcorpion Zombie launches an exploding vase at the nearest plant in its lane.

roman imp.name: roman imp
roman imp.description: Small. Impy. Wears a former lion.

gladiator gargantuar.name: gladiator gargantuar
gladiator gargantuar.description: Wears a helmet. Throws an imp AND a net. Just a real piece of work.

zombie medusa.name: zombie medusa
zombie medusa.description: Zombie Medusa pushes petrified zombies in stone blocks as well as stoneifying zombies and zomboids that face her.

roman caesar zombie.name: roman caesar zombie
roman caesar zombie.description: Roman Caesar Zombie tosses imperial salad dressing onto plants, making them irresistibly delicious to zombies. He also promotes Roman Zombies, giving them stronger helmets.

head office impgantuar.name: head office impgantuar
head office impgantuar.description: His giant noggin is a blunt instrument of smashing.

gargimp legal.name: gargimp legal
gargimp legal.description: gargimp legal delivers cease-and-desists the old-fashioned way with a baseball bat.Tiny but fierce, the Gargimp Legal department is the best and the beast in the business.

zcorp consultant.name: zcorp consultant
zcorp consultant.description: ZCorp Consultant disrupts your paradigm and tableflips your bluesky/redocean.

zcorp helpdesk.name: zcorp helpdesk
zcorp helpdesk.description: ZCorp HelpDesk drops in and throws an exploding laptop.

zcorp chair racer.name: zcorp chair racer
zcorp chair racer.description: ZCorp Chair Racer zooms in at high speed, collides with great impact, and catapults leftward with extraordinary grace.

grinderhead zombie.name: grinderhead zombie
grinderhead zombie.description: Grinderbox helmet provides extra defense against attack, houses a monkey.

carnie cannon.name: carnie cannon
carnie cannon.description: Launches daredevil carnie imps high above the crowds.

magician zombie.name: magician zombie
magician zombie.description: Magician Zombie vanishes zombies and himself forward on the board, and he's got sneaky doves who'll try to fly off with your plants.

firebreather zombie.name: firebreather zombie
firebreather zombie.description: Firebreather Zombie... wait for it... breathes fire. And plenty of it!

stiltwalker zombie.name: stiltwalker zombie
stiltwalker zombie.description: Stiltwalker Zombie's stilts allow him to walk right over most plants.

carnie imp twins.name: carnie imp twins
carnie imp twins.description: Two imps are generously provided for the price of one.

zombot catastro-liope.name: zombot catastro-liope
zombot catastro-liope.special: Despite the decline of circuses in recent years, I refuse to give up on a form of entertainment with so much history and plant-destroying potential, cackles Dr. Zomboss, all while tapping out a jaunty little tune on his keyboard.
zombot catastro-liope.description: can launch Cannonball Imps. The mystery-filled circus-wagon of terrors and delights..

cardio zombie.name: cardio zombie
cardio zombie.description: Advances to a set spot on the board, then tosses buffing brains at other zombies until he's chased away or retreats on his own.

cake tank.name: cake tank
cake tank.description: #caketank advances to a set position on the lawn, then emits shocking birthday surprises as its various layers takes damage.

treasure yeti.name: treasure yeti
treasure yeti.speed details: runs away after a short while
treasure yeti.description: The rare and wondrous Yeti carries his lunch box up and down Mount Brainer to his isolated mountain lodge.. A rare and curious creature, he always packs a lunch..

mummified gargantuar.name: mummified gargantuar
mummified gargantuar.description: Gargantuar is a recurring character within the Plants vs. Zombies franchise. Gargantuars are identified easily by their large muscles, usually holding a large weapon, their huge structure, and aggressive faces, and usually have high health and ways to instantly kill plants. Gargantuars are some of the toughest non-boss zombies in the franchise, and sometimes have been used as bosses due to their strength.

imp cannon.name: imp cannon
imp cannon.special: explodes into a shower of imps if not destroyed quickly
imp cannon.description: Shoots Pirate Imps past your defenses. Eventually it can explode and rain down imps.

gargantuar pirate.name: gargantuar pirate
gargantuar pirate.description: Gargantuar is a recurring character within the Plants vs. Zombies franchise. Gargantuars are identified easily by their large muscles, usually holding a large weapon, their huge structure, and aggressive faces, and usually have high health and ways to instantly kill plants. Gargantuars are some of the toughest non-boss zombies in the franchise, and sometimes have been used as bosses due to their strength.

wild west gargantuar.name: wild west gargantuar
wild west gargantuar.description: Gargantuar is a recurring character within the Plants vs. Zombies franchise. Gargantuars are identified easily by their large muscles, usually holding a large weapon, their huge structure, and aggressive faces, and usually have high health and ways to instantly kill plants. Gargantuars are some of the toughest non-boss zombies in the franchise, and sometimes have been used as bosses due to their strength.

yeti imp.name: yeti imp
yeti imp.description: Yeti Imp is an Imp variant in Plants vs. Zombies: Garden Warfare, Plants vs. Zombies: Garden Warfare 2, and Plants vs. Zombies: Battle for Neighborville. Similar to the Exploding Imp, Yeti Imps run at the player and explode on contact, however, the Yeti Imp can also freeze the player, making it very hard to cope with in large. His attack is called the Snotcicles.

sloth gargantuar.name: sloth gargantuar
sloth gargantuar.description: Gargantuar is a recurring character within the Plants vs. Zombies franchise. Gargantuars are identified easily by their large muscles, usually holding a large weapon, their huge structure, and aggressive faces, and usually have high health and ways to instantly kill plants. Gargantuars are some of the toughest non-boss zombies in the franchise, and sometimes have been used as bosses due to their strength.

peasant zombie.description: No-data found. if you found something you can create a pull request on github

zombie king.name: zombie king
zombie king.description:
Grants knight helms to nearby peasant zombies.
As Shakespeare once wrote, `Uneasy lies the head that wears a crown.` And Zombie King couldn't agree more. It is incredibly difficult to get a good night's sleep with a crown on your head. That thing is all kinds of uncomfortable.

announcer imp.name: announcer imp
announcer imp.description: Imp is a recurring character within the Plants vs. Zombies franchise. Imps typically sneak into plant defenses in one way or another then go further at high speeds, but have lower health. Even in games where they can't sneak into defenses, they typically either have their low health, their speed, or some other way to represent their stealth.

deep sea gargantuar.description: Gargantuar is a recurring character within the Plants vs. Zombies franchise. Gargantuars are identified easily by their large muscles, usually holding a large weapon, their huge structure, and aggressive faces, and usually have high health and ways to instantly kill plants. Gargantuars are some of the toughest non-boss zombies in the franchise, and sometimes have been used as bosses due to their strength.

balloon zombie.name: Balloon Zombie
balloon zombie.description: Balloon Zombie is a recurring character within the Plants vs. Zombies franchise. Balloon Zombies use the red balloons on their backs to hover over plants to reach the player's house, with each game having a different method of dealing with the floating assault.

newspaper zombie.name: Newspaper Zombie
newspaper zombie.description: Newspaper Zombie is a recurring character within the Plants vs. Zombies franchise. Newspaper Zombies arrive reading a newspaper, protecting them from projectiles until it is destroyed, leading the Newspaper Zombie to rampage towards plants in rage.

imp.name: Imp
imp.description: Imp is a recurring character within the Plants vs. Zombies franchise. Imps typically sneak into plant defenses in one way or another then go further at high speeds, but have lower health. Even in games where they can't sneak into defenses, they typically either have their low health, their speed, or some other way to represent their stealth.

gargantuar.name: Gargantuar
gargantuar.description: Gargantuar is a recurring character within the Plants vs. Zombies franchise. Gargantuars are identified easily by their large muscles, usually holding a large weapon, their huge structure, and aggressive faces, and usually have high health and ways to instantly kill plants. Gargantuars are some of the toughest non-boss zombies in the franchise, and sometimes have been used as bosses due to their strength.

zombie monkey.name: zombie monkey
zombie monkey.description: Zombie Monkey absorbs 300 damage per shot and does not degrade. When defeated, it has a 50% chance to drop a silver coin.

carnie imp.name: carnie imp
carnie imp.description: This Imp is one of the strongest Imps due to having armor. Try to stall him with defensives to take time defeating him, as well as slowing plants. Magnet-shrooms are viable to take down this Imp, as they can remove his helmet.

zombie dove.name: Zombie Dove
zombie dove.description: The Zombie Dove absorbs 150 damage per shot and does not degrade. It will be eliminated immediately if hit by Kernel-pult's butter, shrunk by Shrinking Violet or blown away by Blover or Hurrikale.

vase gargantuar.name: vase gargantuar
vase gargantuar.description: Gargantuar is a recurring character within the Plants vs. Zombies franchise. Gargantuars are identified easily by their large muscles, usually holding a large weapon, their huge structure, and aggressive faces, and usually have high health and ways to instantly kill plants. Gargantuars are some of the toughest non-boss zombies in the franchise, and sometimes have been used as bosses due to their strength.

z-mech.name: Z-Mech
z-mech.description: Z-Mech is a recurring character within the Plants vs. Zombies franchise. Originally just the name for the machine Imps use in the shooter series, the name has been used elsewhere in association with this Imp, implying the Imp's name is Z-Mech as well.
